featured.text: Which of the following statements is true, according to the passage? (A) Knight was injured in the explosion of his traffic light.
A gas leak one month later caused an explosion in the lights, injuring the policeman operating it.
First of all, the gases used in bug bombs are highly flammable and thus pose a serious risk of fire or explosion if the product is not used properly.

definition.zh_def: 爆炸；突然的強烈爆發或擴散。
definition.en_def: A sudden and violent release of energy, often resulting in a loud noise and destruction.
definition.example: The explosion shattered the windows of nearby buildings.
